Two men on scooters were killed in separate accidents in the city on Thursday night.

In the first incident, reported from the Nirankari Colony in north-west Delhi’s Mukherjee Nagar, civil service aspirant Sumit Kumar (20) and his friend Naveen (19) were hit by a vehicle at a T-point late on Thursday night.
They were found lying injured on the road by a PCR team and rushed to the trauma centre in Civil Lines.
